snippet: Controversial tennis player Nick Kyrgios will be free to participate in an NBA celebrity game in February after being released from his contract with an ATP event in the Netherlands....
lead_paragraph: Controversial tennis player Nick Kyrgios will be free to participate in an NBA celebrity game in February after being released from his contract with an ATP event in the Netherlands.

headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Skips Tennis Event in Favor of NBA Celebrity Game
headline.main: Kyrgios Skips Tennis Event in Favor of NBA Celebrity Game
